text.div:
Generated Narrative with Details

id: example

url: http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/example

version: 1

name: ID-SEARCH-PARAMETER

derivedFrom: http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Resource-id

status: draft

experimental: true

date: 23/10/2013

publisher: Health Level Seven International (FHIR Infrastructure)

contact:

description: Search by resource identifier - e.g. same as the read interaction, but can return included resources

useContext:

jurisdiction: United States of America (the) (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America (the)'})

purpose: Need to search by identifier for various infrastructural cases - mainly retrieving packages, and matching as part of a chain

code: _id

base: Resource

type: token

expression: id

xpath: f:*\f:id

xpathUsage: normal

comparator: eq

value.name: ID-SEARCH-PARAMETER
value.description: Search by resource identifier - e.g. same as the read interaction, but can return included resources
value.purpose: Need to search by identifier for various infrastructural cases - mainly retrieving packages, and matching as part of a chain

Bad-Request-Response.value:
<OperationOutcome xmlns='http://hl7.org/fhir'>
<issue>
    <severity value='error'/>
    <code value='exception'/>
    <diagnostics value='validation error, path `resourceType` is required'/>
</issue>
</OperationOutcome>

x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/searchparameter-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/SearchParameter \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"SearchParameter","id":"3581bdaa-374d-4ff2-8e7f-3e4604fc5c7e","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/example","version":"1","name":"ID-SEARCH-PARAMETER","derivedFrom":"http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Resource-id","status":"draft","experimental":true,"date":"2013-10-23T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"Health Level Seven International (FHIR Infrastructure)","contact":[{"name":"[string]","telecom":[{"system":"url","value":"http://hl7.org/fhir"}]}],"description":"Search by resource identifier - e.g. same as the read interaction, but can return included resources","useContext":[{"code":{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/usage-context-type","code":"focus"},"valueCodeableConcept":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/variant-state","code":"positive"}]}}],"jurisdiction":[{"coding":[{"system":"urn:iso:std:iso:3166","code":"US","display":"United States of America (the)"}]}],"purpose":"Need to search by identifier for various infrastructural cases - mainly retrieving packages, and matching as part of a chain","code":"_id","base":["Resource"],"type":"token","expression":"id","xpath":"f:*\\f:id","xpathUsage":"normal","comparator":["eq"],"meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.359+08:00"}}'

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The resource type(s) this search parameter applies to

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Code used in URL

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Defines how the part works

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the search parameter

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the search parameter

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the search parameter

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The search parameter publication date

parameters.name: derived-from
parameters.description: Original definition for the search parameter

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the search parameter

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the search parameter

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the search parameter

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the search parameter

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the search parameter

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Types of resource (if a resource reference)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: number | date | string | token | reference | composite | quantity | uri | special

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the search parameter

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the search parameter

resource.name: ID-SEARCH-PARAMETER
resource.description: Search by resource identifier - e.g. same as the read interaction, but can return included resources
resource.purpose: Need to search by identifier for various infrastructural cases - mainly retrieving packages, and matching as part of a chain
